metadata.title: CVE-2018-15126 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
LibVNC before commit 73cb96fec028a576a5a24417b57723b55854ad7b contains heapuse-after-free vulnerability in server code of file transfer extension thatcan result remote code execution

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-15126` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.1
libvncserver-config - 0.9.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.1
libvncserver1 - 0.9.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1.1').
